short_summary: A tender notice for a Request for Supply Arrangement for the purchase of a 4 Channel Programmable Attenuator
description: Innovation, Science and Economic DevelopmentCommunications Research Centre 3701 Carling Avenue, Building 4 Ottawa, ON K2H 8S2
full_summary:
**Title:** 4 Channel Programmable Attenuator Tender Announcement

**Reference Number:** cb-867-8265672
**Amendment Number:** 5
**Solicitation Number:** CRC NPP20231116
**Publication Date:** 2023-11-02

**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-16 14:00:00 EST
**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-11-20
**Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-29

**Description:**
This tender announcement is for the solicitation of bids for a 4 Channel Programmable Attenuator. The requirement is for a product that meets the specifications outlined in Annex A. The contractor must provide a bid for all items listed in Annex A and ensure that the product is in compliance with the requirements specified in the bid solicitation and resulting contract.

**Vendor Selection:**
Bidders who are Supply Arrangement Holders listed in Annex B are invited to submit a proposal. The selection criteria for the bid evaluation will include:

* Technical compliance to the requirements presented herein and in Annex A
* Conformity to the equivalent product clause (B3000T)
* Firm prices in Canadian dollars with Freight charges included

**Evaluation and Award:**
Bids must be submitted no later than November 16, 2023 at 14:00 EST. The lowest priced responsive bid will be recommended for award of a contract. The contractor must provide the goods in accordance with the requirements stated in the bid solicitation and resulting contract.

**Contractor Information:**
The contract will be awarded to a vendor who meets the requirements specified in the bid solicitation and resulting contract. The contractor must provide all necessary equipment and services to meet the requirements of the contract.

**Access to Contract Documents:**
Access to the contract documents, including the bid solicitation and resulting contract, can be found on the Canada Buys website at [link to attachment].

**Contact Information:**
For any questions or concerns regarding this tender announcement, please contact Samantha Amadio at Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada, Communications Research Centre, 3701 Carling Avenue, Ottawa, ON K2H 8S2. Phone: (343) 542-2505; Email: [samantha.amadio@ised-isde.gc.ca](mailto:samantha.amadio@ised-isde.gc.ca)

Note: I have reformatted the text to improve readability and clarity. I have also removed redundant and unnecessary
